directions: In a medium saucepan, stir together the flour, sugar, tapioca, vinegar, and the reserved pineapple juice.  Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thick.  Remove from heat and chill.
In a large bowl, combine the pineapple, apples, peanuts, and chilled tapioca mixture.  Fold in the whipped topping and chill for at least 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained with juice reserved
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Affy Tapple Salad
